mean_cn: adj. （印记等）无法擦除的，无法忘怀的
mean_en: impossible to forget or remove; (of ink, pens, etc.) leaving a mark that cannot be removed
sentence: I hope you really like your face tattoo, because it's indelible!
sentence_trans: 我希望你真的喜欢脸上的涂鸦，因为它是擦不掉的。
word_etyma: in不 + del擦掉 + ible形容词“能…的” → indelible不可磨灭的
